title: Which is the good app to merge mp3 songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Easy. I would simply use ProTools, and splice it all together. I think there’s still a free version of ProTools available. Also, I think you can get it as a free trial and just do what you need to do during the trial period. Another alternative I’ve used for quick editing tasks is Audacity, which is free. There are probably a few other options in the free or low cost range, and, of course, Logic, or Digital Performer, or Cubase, etc. Hope that helps.
Try the mp3 cutter joiner app on android.MP3 Cutter and Ringtone Maker♫ - Android Apps on Google PlayYou can use MixPad for doing the same on a PChttp://www.nch.com.au/mixpad/mpfreesetup.exe
